name: Owl Coffee Sleeve, Coffee Cozy, Java Jacket
description:
Whoo wants something warm and cozy? Owls in various stages of of their morning coffee decorate this cute cup sleeve. Made from cotton fabric and a heat resistant insulator, this coffee sleeve is eco friendly and slips easily into your purse or briefcase for everyday use. This is a great gift for that trendy person on your list. Keep track of YOUR cup. Suprise a friend with a matching cup sleeve! Works on both hot and cold drink cups. Fits most 12, 16, and 20 oz cups.

Hand wash and lay flat to dry... or just throw it in the washer if you want!

categories.name: Coffee Sleeve, Coffee Cozy, Java Jacket

name: Brown and Blue Newsboy Hat
description:
This hat is so soft and incredibly cute on baby boys. Its made from soft acrylic brown and blue yarn. It would make a great photo prop or just a warm fall, winter, and spring hat for that special little one.

I can make this in any size or color you need. Just leave a note with your order.

name: Purple Party Sock Monkey Hat
description:
The popular sock monkey hat with a twist! This super cute hat has a slightly pointy top like a birthday party hat. It is corcheted with soft yarn and has braided ties to help keep it on or just for decoration. The little flower has a little jewel in it for some bling. Perfect party hat for your 1st birthday... or 2nd... or cute for just everyday.

I can make this in little boy colors too. Other sizes availble upon request.

Made with soft acrylic yarn for easy machine washing.

name: Little Birdie Beanie
description:
Tweet! Tweet! How sweet! Perfect for keeping your little one warm on a cool spring day, as a photography prop, or as a fun addition to an everyday wardrobe. Hand crocheted with soft 100% cotton yarn. The hat in the photo is sized to fit 3-6 month old child, but if you would like a different size make sure you note that in the comments section on the order.
Sizes available:
0-6 months
6-12 months
child 1-5
5-8
8+
Other colors available as well.

*Custom orders are always welcome! I can change the size/color on any item in the shop!
